```{r, message = F, warning = F, include = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(rstatix)

getwd()
load("df.rda")
load("df_long_peptidomics.rda")
```


```{r}
#Retrieve long format
long <- df_long_peptidomics %>%
    #Reverse log2 transformation
    dplyr::mutate(abundance = 2^abundance) %>% 
    #Make values smaller
    dplyr::mutate(abundance = abundance/1e6) %>% 
    #filter for 1 peptide at exercise time point
    dplyr::filter(peptide == "AAAIEAAAKKLE" & time == "exercise") %>% 
    dplyr::select(-c("time_num", "hb"))

#Analyze
lmm <- lmer(log(abundance) ~ site*flow + (0+site|id), data=long)

summary(lmm)

```
